Primary business..validate: newData.isString() && (newData.val() == Fisher || newData.val() == Distributor || newData.val() == Processor || newData.val() == Fish Monger)

Province/Territory..validate: (newData.val() == AB || newData.val() == BC || newData.val() == MB || newData.val() == NB || newData.val() == NL || newData.val() == NS || newData.val() == NT || newData.val() == NU || newData.val() == ON || newData.val() ==  PE || newData.val() == QC || newData.val() == SK || newData.val() == NU || newData.val() == YT)
